page.title: 18LIGHTNING STRIKES
page.content:
"When I came home there was rubble behind the street door. For a minute I couldn't make out what had happened.I thought we'd been burgled.We didn't know what to do first.There was a big hole in the roof and rain was coming in everywhere. "The thunderbolt just chose our house. It blew the fuse on the electric kettle and the C.B. The cat went deaf. "First of all we thought of ringing our builder as rain was coming through the roof.The thunderbolt had blown the main fuse so we phoned the electricians.I was in a bit of a dream _all these people in there.I was making cups of tea and coffee."
(AN INTERVIEW WITH A HOUSE OWNER)
